Html: Good day!Really need professional advice!On my map, I want highlight with the coordinates railways, for example a different color, as in MS Paint draw the line. Using components Gmapmarker and Gmaproute, my map is very slow and freezes up, because so many of coordinates. I want to ask you: is it possible to draw on another? Something like drawing a line in the Paint. Or can we have any other alternative GoogleMap components  in C #?  I do not want to change Gmap.Net. I would be very grateful for any help and advice. Also many thanks to the developers of the GMap.Net.
One track (from point A to point B) - about 30,000 of coordinates
Coordinates are recorded with GPS receiver while moving train. Every second of the current position of the train to a file. Now I have to draw it :((( I'm on the verge of despair :(
skip every 10s and add that point to route
Thanks, but it is only one track. Tracks is very much, respectively, and the number of coordinates in one track will have to be multiplied by 200. But thanks anyway! :)
